48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrates, saying:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: “The lifespan of my nation is between sixty to seventy, and the least of them are those who surpass that.”

chapter.eng-name: "The Lifespan Of (The People In) My Nation Is Between Sixty to Seventy"
